taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a domain model opened in the editor.
taskbody.context: Most packaged annotations are made for Design Studio and back-end services.

step.cmd: Select the attribute or association you want to update in the editor.
Click the Property view and select the Annotations tab.
Right-click the rectangle on the left side of the annotation properties table.
Fill the information and click OK.
step.info: Refer to the related references topic for more details.

step.cmd: Click the newly created annotation. You can now add properties by clicking the Add button.
